---
title: "Midterm Help"
author: "Matt Crump"
---


# sum numbers from 1 to 100


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sum(1:100)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 5050
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1+2+3+4

a <- 0

for(i in 1:100){
  a <- a+i
}

a
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 5050
```
:::
:::


Write a function to find the sum of all integers between any two values.


    function_name <- function(input_name){
      #body where you modify input
      return(name_of_output)
    }

    # running the function
    function_name(some_input)


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sum(50:100)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 3825
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
sum(500:1000)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 375750
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
sum_sequence <- function(min,max){

  return(sum(min:max))
  
}

sum_sequence(min = 5, max = 100)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 5040
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
sum_sequence_loop <- function(min,max){
  
  a <- 0
  
  for(i in min:max){
    a <- a+i
  }
  
  return(a)
  
}

sum_sequence_loop(1,10)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 55
```
:::
:::


Generate 100 random numbers


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
?runif

 random_numbers <-runif(n = 1000,min=0,max=1000)
 
 hist(random_numbers)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
  normal_numbers <-rnorm(n = 1000,0,10)
 
 hist(normal_numbers)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
 sample(1:6, 1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 2
```
:::
:::


## Solve fizz buzz problem


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
for(i in 1:100) {
  if(i %% 3 == 0 & i %% 5 == 0) {
    print("FizzBuzz")
  } else if(i %% 3 == 0) {
    print("Fizz")
  } else if(i %% 5 == 0) {
    print("Buzz")
  } else {
    print(i)
  }
}
```
